heading: HR00053
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE PROPER COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND/OR INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO STOP AND PROHIBIT THE IMPLEMENTATION OF INITIAL COIN OFFERINGS (ICO) AND OTHER SIMILAR UNREGULATED INVESTMENT SCHEMES, TO CREATE AND ESTABLISH THE PROPER REGULATORY PROCEDURES, TO PROTECT THE RIGHTS OF THE INVESTING PUBLIC

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00053
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE PROPER COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY AND/OR INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO STOP AND PROHIBIT THE IMPLEMENTATION OF INITIAL COIN OFFERINGS (ICO) AND OTHER SIMILAR UNREGULATED INVESTMENT SCHEMES, TO CREATE AND ESTABLISH THE PROPER REGULATORY PROCEDURES, TO PROTECT THE RIGHTS OF THE INVESTING PUBLIC
